MESSAGE.JP: も昇る前の明け方。
MESSAGE.EN: Just before dawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just before dawn.

MESSAGE.JP: 電子音に目が覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I woke up to an electronic sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I woke up to an electronic sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 帯電話を確認すると、恭介からメールが来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked my phone and found an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked my phone and found an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: バトルランキング結果発表!!』
MESSAGE.EN: [The results of the battle ranking!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [The results of the battle ranking!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 、終わってたんだ、あれ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah right, it's ended...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah right, it's ended...

MESSAGE.JP: が優勝だ!!
MESSAGE.EN: I've got first place!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got first place!!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やったぁ…っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わず声を上げてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I unconsciously shouted out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I unconsciously shouted out.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、すぐにその熱は冷めてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But it didn't take long for the heat of the victory to fade.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But it didn't take long for the heat of the victory to fade.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（僕の実力はまだまだな気がする…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I feel like this isn't all I've got...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I feel like this isn't all I've got...)

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。これからもまだまだ精進あるのみ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I'm sure of it. I must keep up my effort from here on...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I'm sure of it. I must keep up my effort from here on...

MESSAGE.JP: して、まだ見ぬ猛者がこの学校に潜んでいるような、そんな気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: My gut tells me that there are still stronger guys I've yet to meet lurking in the school...
MESSAGE.Translation: My gut tells me that there are still stronger guys I've yet to meet lurking in the school...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真の最強への道はまだ遠い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I still have a long road ahead to truly be called the strongest one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I still have a long road ahead to truly be called the strongest one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 回大会がいつになるかはわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know when the second battle rankings will begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know when the second battle rankings will begin.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、これからも僕はさすらい続けよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless, I must continue wandering even now...
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless, I must continue wandering even now...

MESSAGE.JP: あいつの名前はない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't see his name.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't see his name.

MESSAGE.JP: の仮面の男に、僕は負けたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I lost to that masked guy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lost to that masked guy.

MESSAGE.JP: とえこのランキングで１位を取ったとしても、あいつに勝てなければ、僕には価値は見出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I have taken the first place in the battle ranking, I can't discover my own worth until I beat him up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I have taken the first place in the battle ranking, I can't discover my own worth until I beat him up.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。これからもまだまだ精進あるのみ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I must keep on making an effort...
MESSAGE.Translation: I must keep on making an effort...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真の最強への道はまだ遠い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I still have a very long way to go to truly be able to call myself the strongest one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I still have a very long way to go to truly be able to call myself the strongest one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 回大会がいつになるかはわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know when the second battle rankings will begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know when the second battle rankings will begin.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、これからも僕はさすらい続けよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I'm going to continue to wander...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I'm going to continue to wander...

MESSAGE.JP: いにやった…!!
MESSAGE.EN: I finally made it...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally made it...!!

MESSAGE.JP: にかけてあるマスクに目をやる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look at the mask hanging on the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look at the mask hanging on the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 実ともに、僕は最強の座を手に入れたんだ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Both in reality and name, I've obtained the seat of the strongest one!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Both in reality and name, I've obtained the seat of the strongest one!!

MESSAGE.JP: 意に、携帯が鳴り響く。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, my cellphone started ringing.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, my cellphone started ringing.

MESSAGE.JP: 出人：神北　小毬$dタイトル：『優勝おめでとう！』
MESSAGE.EN:
Sender: Komari Kamikita
Subject: [Congratulations on your victory!]
MESSAGE.Translation:
Sender: Komari Kamikita
Subject: [Congratulations on your victory!]

MESSAGE.JP: 文：『優勝おめでとう！　りきくんはすごくがんばったね！　ほんとうにすごいよー（＾▽＾）』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [Congrats on your victory! You deserve it! It's really amazing（＾▽＾）]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [Congrats on your victory! You deserve it! It's really amazing（＾▽＾）]

MESSAGE.JP: んなからの祝福のメールだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I received congratulation mails from everybody.
MESSAGE.Translation: I received congratulation mails from everybody.

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんは真っ先に送ってくれたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like Komari-san was the first to send hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like Komari-san was the first to send hers.

MESSAGE.JP: 出人：能美　クドリャフカ$dタイトル：『おめでとうございます』
MESSAGE.EN:
Sender: Kudryavka Noumi
Subject: [Congratulations!]
MESSAGE.Translation:
Sender: Kudryavka Noumi
Subject: [Congratulations!]

MESSAGE.JP: 文：『リキ、優勝おめでとうございます！　名実ともに最強の座を手に入れましたね!!　Load to viktolyです!!』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [Riki, congrats on your win! Now everybody recognizes you are the strongest!! Load to viktoly!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [Riki, congrats on your win! Now everybody recognizes you are the strongest!! Load to viktoly!!]

MESSAGE.JP: なみに最後の英語は間違えまくっている。

MESSAGE.JP: 出人：西園　美魚$dタイトル：『おめでと』
MESSAGE.EN:
Sender: Mio Nishizono
Subject: [Congrats]
MESSAGE.Translation:
Sender: Mio Nishizono
Subject: [Congrats]

MESSAGE.JP: 文：『優勝　おめでとうござます、とてもはればれしくおおもいかと思います。本当におめでとうございます。』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [Congratulations on your victory. It must be a great feeling. I offer my greatest congratulations.]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [Congratulations on your victory. It must be a great feeling. I offer my greatest congratulations.]

Sender: Haruka Saigusa

MESSAGE.Translation:
Sender: Haruka Saigusa
Subject: [YOU!! SHOW!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 文：『はるちんむっちゃくやしー！　（≧皿≦）きー!!　次は負けませんヨ（≧▽≦）ノ　でもおめでと！』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [Haruchin is so mad at herself!（≧皿≦）Dang!! I won't lose next time!（≧▽≦）ノ Congrats, though!]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [Haruchin is so mad at herself!（≧皿≦）Dang!! I won't lose next time!（≧▽≦）ノ Congrats, though!]

Sender: Yuiko Kurugaya

Sender: Yuiko Kurugaya

Sender: Yuiko Kurugaya

Sender: Kengo Miyazawa

MESSAGE.EN: Message: [You are the strongest. With time, everything changes. But for true strength you still have a long journey ahead. Next time, I'll be the strongest!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [You are the strongest. With time, everything changes. But for true strength you still have a long journey ahead. Next time, I'll be the strongest!!]

MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, with this, our battles are over.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phaahh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phaahh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まだ早い。二度寝しよう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's too early to get up. I can go to sleep again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's too early to get up. I can go to sleep again.

MESSAGE.JP: 日は休みの日だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Today is a holiday.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today is a holiday.

MESSAGE.JP: つもの時計のアラームも鳴らない。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why my alarm clock isn't set up.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why my alarm clock isn't set up.

MESSAGE.JP: かな朝だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a silent morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a silent morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッドから体を起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: I wrenched myself in a sitting position.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wrenched myself in a sitting position.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋を見渡しても真人は居なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking around, I noticed that Masato wasn't in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking around, I noticed that Masato wasn't in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: の筋トレでもしているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He's probably doing his morning training.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's probably doing his morning training.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いたた…ちゃんと終わった後に柔軟運動してるのにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ouch... even though I cooled down properly after.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ouch... even though I cooled down properly after.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 動能力は人並みなはずの自分の体がついていっていない気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I was okay physically, but my body just couldn't keep up...
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I was okay physically, but my body just couldn't keep up...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…というより、真人や謙吾や恭介が人並み以上なんだよな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...More like, Masato, Kengo and Kyousuke are way too athletic...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...More like, Masato, Kengo and Kyousuke are way too athletic...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッドから降りて僕はため息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I got to my feet and let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got to my feet and let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん…雨、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm... It's raining.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... It's raining.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うりで静かなはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That explained why it was so quiet in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: That explained why it was so quiet in here.

MESSAGE.JP: 雨がしとしと降っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The water was drizzling down softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The water was drizzling down softly.

MESSAGE.JP: K88梅雨$K0入り前の雨降りの光景は、見慣れた風景にグレイを塗りたくったような感じがした。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite it not being the $K88rainy season$K0 yet, the scenery was clouded over, all the familiar landscape painted gray.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite it not being the $K88rainy season$K0 yet, the scenery was clouded over, all the familiar landscape painted gray.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さて、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 替えて、朝ご飯を食べにいくとしますか。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll change and go to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll change and go to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: はハンガーにぶら下がっている服に手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached for the hanger that held my clothes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached for the hanger that held my clothes.

MESSAGE.JP: 日は男子と女子がなんとなく利用時間を分ける形になっている。
MESSAGE.EN: On weekdays boys and girls don't use the cafeteria at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: On weekdays boys and girls don't use the cafeteria at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、休日はそうでもない。
MESSAGE.EN: Holidays, however, are different.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holidays, however, are different.

MESSAGE.JP: 子も女子も休日は生活時間がてんでバラバラになるからだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Both boys and girls get up at different times and there's no order in which they come to eat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both boys and girls get up at different times and there's no order in which they come to eat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何を食べようかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I get?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I get?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は食券販売機の前で考え込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I pondered in front of a food ticket machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pondered in front of a food ticket machine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「といっても休日の朝はそんなにメニューが出ないんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝On holidays there isn't that much to choose from to begin with, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝On holidays there isn't that much to choose from to begin with, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 売機のボタンはランプがついているものだけが今並んでいる、ということ。
MESSAGE.EN: Only the items with their buttons highlighted are available.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only the items with their buttons highlighted are available.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まぁトーストセットでいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'll have a toast set.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'll have a toast set.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は食券を買って、厨房の前に進んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a ticket and moved on to the counter.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a ticket and moved on to the counter.

MESSAGE.JP: ウンターで食券と引き替えにトーストとコーヒー、それにゆで卵を受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: At the counter I exchanged my ticket for toast, coffee, and boiled eggs.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the counter I exchanged my ticket for toast, coffee, and boiled eggs.

MESSAGE.JP: こにしようかな、と首を巡らしたとき、見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was looking for a seat, I found somebody I know.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was looking for a seat, I found somebody I know.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐー、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドだった。相変わらず棒読みだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kud, greeting me with her usual monotone English.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kud, greeting me with her usual monotone English.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは食堂に何台か置いてあるテレビの前の席に座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting at the table in front of one of the cafeteria's TVs.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting at the table in front of one of the cafeteria's TVs.

MESSAGE.JP: をぶんぶんっ、と振ったクドは自分の存在をアピールしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was waving her arm to draw my attention.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was waving her arm to draw my attention.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I could see you even if you didn't do that...)

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There's an empty seat here～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: As I passed around her to the seat, I heard the lifeless voice of a TV announcer.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kamiizumi Nobutsuna created the prototype for the shinai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kamiizumi Nobutsuna created the prototype for the shinai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「同じようでも微妙に違っていて見ていると面白いものなんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Every shinai looks alike, yet it's very interesting comparing their minute differences.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Every shinai looks alike, yet it's very interesting comparing their minute differences.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へー、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは時代劇好きなのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be that she likes historical dramas?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be that she likes historical dramas?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私もそのカタログ見せてもらっていいですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Could I also have a look at that catalog?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Could I also have a look at that catalog?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、謙吾に頼めば見せてくれると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm sure he'll show it to you if you only ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm sure he'll show it to you if you only ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ほんとですかー。楽しみですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? I can't wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? I can't wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴からモンペチを買ってくるよう頼まれていたんだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin told me to buy her Mon Petits.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin told me to buy her Mon Petits.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「猫さんの餌ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Cat food, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Cat food, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。消費量が結構多いんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Her cats are high maintenance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Her cats are high maintenance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は猫の群れを率いてるみたいなものだからなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: She is like the leader of the pack.
MESSAGE.Translation: She is like the leader of the pack.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ペット屋さんで新しい味が出るとチェックしてるみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Every time a new flavor is released, she goes to a pet shop to check it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Every time a new flavor is released, she goes to a pet shop to check it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「最近は色々なペットフード売られていますからねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There really are many kinds of pet foods sold these days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There really are many kinds of pet foods sold these days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、私もジャーキーを買わなくちゃです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, I must get jerky too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, I must get jerky too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…？　あ、そっか。ストレルカたちのご飯？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...? Ah, for Strelka and Belka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...? Ah, for Strelka and Belka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですそうです。お仕事がんばってるご褒美なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right. It's a reward for always working so hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right. It's a reward for always working so hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ごちそうさまでしたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thanks for the meal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thanks for the meal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは箸を揃えてテーブルに置く。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her chopsticks onto the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her chopsticks onto the table.

MESSAGE.JP: れからパン！　と小気味良い音を立てて手を合わせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she brought her hands together in a thanks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she brought her hands together in a thanks.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今日も美味しかったです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was really tasty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was really tasty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お米の神様に感謝です～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I thank the god of rice～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I thank the god of rice～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: して一礼。
MESSAGE.EN: And she bowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she bowed.

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらず、中身とその他諸々が合致していない女の子だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As usual, her behavior was in stark contrast to her supposed foreign identity.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As usual, her behavior was in stark contrast to her supposed foreign identity.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、一時間後に、食堂の出口で待ち合わせ。いいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, let's meet up at the cafeteria entrance in an hour. Is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, let's meet up at the cafeteria entrance in an hour. Is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Got it, I'll be there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Got it, I'll be there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドと合流して校門へ向かうころには、小雨は止んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: By the time we reached the school gate, the rain had almost cleared.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the time we reached the school gate, the rain had almost cleared.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「傘、要りませんでしたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It looks like we won't be needing umbrellas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It looks like we won't be needing umbrellas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「途中で降るかもしれないから、持って行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It may still rain on the way, so let's take them to play safe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It may still rain on the way, so let's take them to play safe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それもそうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You have a point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You have a point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、ちょっと待っててください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, could you wait for a minute?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, could you wait for a minute?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは上着のポケットから封筒と切手を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud produced an envelope and two stamps from the pocket of her jacket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud produced an envelope and two stamps from the pocket of her jacket.

MESSAGE.JP: をちょこん、と出して二枚の切手を軽く舐める。
MESSAGE.EN: She then put out her tongue and lightly licked the stamps.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then put out her tongue and lightly licked the stamps.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは封筒の右上にぺたり、と貼った。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally, she applied them to the top-right corner of the envelope.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally, she applied them to the top-right corner of the envelope.

MESSAGE.JP: 書に使う５０円切手。
MESSAGE.EN: One of the stamps was the standard 50-yen one for postcards.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of the stamps was the standard 50-yen one for postcards.

MESSAGE.JP: れから右隅が紫色な鳥の絵柄切手。あまり見たことのない切手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The other one had a purple bird design. I'd never seen that one before.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other one had a purple bird design. I'd never seen that one before.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「手紙出してきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll go and send it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll go and send it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは校門から少しだけ離れたところにある郵便ポストに向かって走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She ran toward the postbox located near the gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ran toward the postbox located near the gate.

MESSAGE.JP: らりと見えた封筒の片隅には『ＡＩＲＭＡＩＬ』と書いてあった気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught the word ❛AIRMAIL❜ written on the envelope.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught the word ❛AIRMAIL❜ written on the envelope.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ただいまです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm back, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm back, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかえり、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Welcome back, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Welcome back, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「では、行きましょうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とクドは並んで歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: We started walking abreast.
MESSAGE.Translation: We started walking abreast.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙について訊ねるべきか僕はちょっと迷った。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't decide whether I should ask her about the letter.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't decide whether I should ask her about the letter.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、関係ない話をクドに振ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the end, I ended up with another topic.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the end, I ended up with another topic.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そろそろこの街には慣れた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you gotten used to this city?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you gotten used to this city?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは空を見上げていた視線を戻して僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud, who had been staring up at the sky, looked back at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud, who had been staring up at the sky, looked back at me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「え、あぁ、はい、もうすっかり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, ah, yes, I have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, ah, yes, I have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「商店街のほうへはあまり行っていません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I haven't been to the shopping district many times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I haven't been to the shopping district many times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「知らない街で迷うのは私のいつものことなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I always lose my way in unfamiliar places before I know it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I always lose my way in unfamiliar places before I know it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「最初に来たときも迷いました…ような。確か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If I remember correctly, I lost my way on my first visit there, too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If I remember correctly, I lost my way on my first visit there, too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは首をひねっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was tilting her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was tilting her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you did?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you did?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 店街への道はまっすぐだから迷いようがない……はずなんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way you can get lost on the way to the shopping district because it's a straight road there from the school... or so you'd think.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way you can get lost on the way to the shopping district because it's a straight road there from the school... or so you'd think.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなにわかりづらいかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was the route that complicated?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was the route that complicated?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えーと、多分私が細い路地ばかり通ったせいかもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, I think it might've been because I only used alleyways.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, I think it might've been because I only used alleyways.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「路地を歩くの好きなものですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love walking in alleyways.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love walking in alleyways.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「路地ばっかり歩いてたらそれは迷うよ、さすがに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that explains everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that explains everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、大きい道を通れば大丈夫、迷うことないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll be fine so long as you follow the main street.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll be fine so long as you follow the main street.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなに一本道だし。
MESSAGE.EN: It's such a straight road.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's such a straight road.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで、何を買うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what are you going to buy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what are you going to buy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「枕ですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A pillow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A pillow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「やっぱりおじい様の木の枕は首が疲れますので…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The one my grandfather gave me isn't comfortable, after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The one my grandfather gave me isn't comfortable, after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃそうだね。クドはどんな枕が好みなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wouldn't think so. What kind of pillow do you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wouldn't think so. What kind of pillow do you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですね、どちらかというと羽根枕はあんまり好きじゃないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's see, I don't really like feather pillows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's see, I don't really like feather pillows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れはちょっと意外な気もした。
MESSAGE.EN: That was surprising to hear.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was surprising to hear.

MESSAGE.JP: 根枕のほうが外国っぽいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Feather pillows have a more foreign-ish feel, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Feather pillows have a more foreign-ish feel, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「やっぱりそば殻（がら）枕が一番ですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I like buckwheat hull pillows best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I like buckwheat hull pillows best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「風通しが良くて、枕を転がすと鳴る音が綺麗ですし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They are airy and make pretty sounds when you roll them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They are airy and make pretty sounds when you roll them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは指折りながら、利点を挙げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She started counting their good points with her fingers as she explained them to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started counting their good points with her fingers as she explained them to me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「量を調整することで、自分にぴったりの高さにもできるところがないすなぴろーです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They are naisu piro-, because you can adjust the height as you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They are naisu piro-, because you can adjust the height as you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ないす・ぴろ～！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naisu piro～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naisu piro～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そこで唐突にオドロキビックリフォーリナーしなくてもいいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have to suddenly act like a surprised foreigner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have to suddenly act like a surprised foreigner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「羽根枕だとふかふかしすぎて埋もれてしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My head is so small it gets buried if I use a feather pillow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My head is so small it gets buried if I use a feather pillow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...True enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...True enough.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの頭は小さいからなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: She certainly has a small head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She certainly has a small head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキはこだわりはありますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What kind of pillow is your favorite?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What kind of pillow is your favorite?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いや、そういうのはないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't really have such a thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't really have such a thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いうよりも。
MESSAGE.EN: More like...
MESSAGE.Translation: More like...

MESSAGE.JP: は眠りに陥る瞬間をあまり快く思っていないせいもある。
MESSAGE.EN: Falling asleep is nothing but an unpleasant feeling to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Falling asleep is nothing but an unpleasant feeling to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、良さそうなのがあったら見てみるよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I think I'll check some out too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I think I'll check some out too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは生活用品店に足を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: We headed toward a livingware store.
MESSAGE.Translation: We headed toward a livingware store.

MESSAGE.JP: りがとうございましたー、という店員の声に送られる。
MESSAGE.EN: The store clerk's ❛Thank you for coming❜ trailed after us as we exited the store.
MESSAGE.Translation: The store clerk's ❛Thank you for coming❜ trailed after us as we exited the store.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっとかさばるね、確かに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This really is quite bulky, like you said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This really is quite bulky, like you said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「すみません、本当に。ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sorry to make you do this, but I really appreciate it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sorry to make you do this, but I really appreciate it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが買ったのは、そば殻の袋と枕カバーだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had bought a sack of buckwheat hulls and a pillowcase.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had bought a sack of buckwheat hulls and a pillowcase.

MESSAGE.JP: れとは別に紙袋を抱えているところを見ると、何か買ったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: However, she also had another paper bag, the contents of which I didn't know.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, she also had another paper bag, the contents of which I didn't know.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれには触れずに言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even try to ask what it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even try to ask what it was.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（なぜって女の子の買い物をあれこれ訊くとドツボにはまりそうだからなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Because once you start discussing shopping with girls, you may be in for a long talk...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Because once you start discussing shopping with girls, you may be in for a long talk...)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「このそば殻を詰めるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You need to stuff the buckwheat hulls into that pillowcase, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You need to stuff the buckwheat hulls into that pillowcase, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「中身はずっと使えるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And you need to replace the contents periodically?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And you need to replace the contents periodically?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「数年でぺちゃんこになっちゃうので、入れ替えしなくちゃなのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. Once every few years.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. Once every few years.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あとは虫干しとかも必要です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And you need to air it out at times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And you need to air it out at times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうか、虫が付いたら大変だもんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. It'd be a big problem if it gets infested.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. It'd be a big problem if it gets infested.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「パイプ材が中身だとそういうのも必要ないんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You don't have to worry about that if you use pipe stuffing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You don't have to worry about that if you use pipe stuffing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキはお好み枕、ありましたかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Did you find any pillows that suit your taste?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Did you find any pillows that suit your taste?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ボディピローをいくつか見てたみたいですけど…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You were looking at the body pillows, weren't you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You were looking at the body pillows, weren't you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ディピロ―、とは抱き枕のことだろう。さっきの店にも専用コーナーにおいてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: They're human-sized, huggable pillows. I had spotted some in the corner of the store.
MESSAGE.Translation: They're human-sized, huggable pillows. I had spotted some in the corner of the store.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、あれは面白い形のが多かったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, they had some funny shapes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, they had some funny shapes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぬいぐるみみたいなものもあるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Some of them looked like stuffed animals.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Some of them looked like stuffed animals.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ルカとかライオンとか。
MESSAGE.EN: Dolphins, lions, etc.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dolphins, lions, etc.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「抱きつきながら眠ると、よく寝られるのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if you can sleep well, hugging them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if you can sleep well, hugging them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ど、どうなんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hm, I wonder?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hm, I wonder?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「い、いえ、抱きつきながら寝たことがないのでわからないです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I mean, I'm not sure if they work, because I have never used them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I mean, I'm not sure if they work, because I have never used them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、抱き枕は嫌いなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't like huggable pillows?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't like huggable pillows?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、いえ、好きじゃないこともないこともないのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, no, it's not that I don't like them, or dislike them, or...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, no, it's not that I don't like them, or dislike them, or...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「というより、やったことがないのでやっぱり好きか嫌いかもよくわからなくってっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝More like, I'm not sure if I like them or not, because I have never tried them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝More like, I'm not sure if I like them or not, because I have never tried them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あぁぁ、でもやってみたいです、是非っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahhh, but I'd like to do that. I'd love to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahhh, but I'd like to do that. I'd love to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…抱き枕にすればよかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So you think you should have picked up a huggy pillow instead?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So you think you should have picked up a huggy pillow instead?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「え、あ…ええと、い、いえ、その！　なんでもないですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, uh... No, no, I mean, never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, uh... No, no, I mean, never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でもちょっと予算オーバーでしたから、無理でしたね、うん、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But I didn't have enough money, so either way it would've been impossible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But I didn't have enough money, so either way it would've been impossible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはなぜか真っ赤になって俯いている。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why, but she's looking down with a blush on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why, but she's looking down with a blush on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか。じゃあしょうがないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. It couldn't be helped, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. It couldn't be helped, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、しょうがないです、しょうがない、しょうがない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Right. It couldn't be helped. It couldn't be helped, couldn't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Right. It couldn't be helped. It couldn't be helped, couldn't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: を歩くクドはぶつぶつ呟いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept murmuring to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept murmuring to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はっ！　この場合はのーじんじゃー、と言うべきでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hah! Should I say ❛no ginger❜ here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hah! Should I say ❛no ginger❜ here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「多分違うと思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は苦笑しながら答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered with a wry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered with a wry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 店街の出口へ向かおうとした僕は、隣にクドが居ないことに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I tried to get out of the shopping street, I noticed Kud wasn't beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I tried to get out of the shopping street, I noticed Kud wasn't beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド？　何を見てるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud? What are you looking at?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud? What are you looking at?❞

MESSAGE.JP: し戻ると、家電屋の前でクドが足を止めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked back a little ways to Kud, who was standing in front of an electronics store.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked back a little ways to Kud, who was standing in front of an electronics store.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ。すみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sorry, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sorry, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが見ているのは携帯のパンフだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at a cellphone catalog.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at a cellphone catalog.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最近また新しい機種が出たのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there some new model out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there some new model out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まり詳しいことは知らないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not so familiar with the cellphone industry.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not so familiar with the cellphone industry.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「実は先ほど、水没させてしまったのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝As a matter of fact, mine accidentally fell into water...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝As a matter of fact, mine accidentally fell into water...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありゃ。洗面所かどこかで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ouch. In a bathroom or what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ouch. In a bathroom or what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…電源入らなくなってしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes... It won't turn on anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes... It won't turn on anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「新しいの買わなくちゃです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll have to get a new one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll have to get a new one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキが使っていたのはこれですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is the one you are using, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is the one you are using, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは載っている写真を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at a picture in the catalog.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at a picture in the catalog.

MESSAGE.JP: ンフを見ながら歩き出すクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She began walking while reading the catalog.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began walking while reading the catalog.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、そうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's the one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's the one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も一緒に歩みを再開した。
MESSAGE.EN: I started walking again at her side.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started walking again at her side.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうしてこれなんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why did you choose that one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why did you choose that one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして、と言われても…なんだったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why? Hmm, I don't remember well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why? Hmm, I don't remember well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「確か、カタログを見ていて鈴がさ、『これでいいだろ』って言ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, Rin was looking at a catalog and said this one would be good for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, Rin was looking at a catalog and said this one would be good for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 拠は特になく、単なるフィーリングらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Although when I asked her for the reason, she answered that she just felt so.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although when I asked her for the reason, she answered that she just felt so.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうなんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドはさ、手、ちっちゃいから小さめのやつのほうがいいのかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A small one might be good for you since you have such small hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A small one might be good for you since you have such small hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「例えばどれですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Which kind would you recommend?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Which kind would you recommend?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「折りたたみ型は重たいのも多いし…ストレート型のかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Shell types can be heavy... so a straight one might be good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Shell types can be heavy... so a straight one might be good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「パンフレットに手を当ててみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Put your hand on the paper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Put your hand on the paper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。実物大の写真だからさ、こんな感じで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Those photos are life-size, so you can check that the phone fits your hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Those photos are life-size, so you can check that the phone fits your hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なるほど～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I see～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I see～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「前使ってたやつはどんなのだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What was your previous phone like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What was your previous phone like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ええと、ええと、こういうやつです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, well, that one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, well, that one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: トレート型だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a straight type.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a straight type.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どっちにしろ小さめのやつだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Either way, you should get a small one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Either way, you should get a small one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「申し込みは確か購買部でも出来た気がするから、今度申し込むといいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Also, you can make the order through the school store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Also, you can make the order through the school store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、そうですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、赤信号だよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, the light's red!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, the light's red!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 道の端で僕は慌ててクドを引き留める。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly reached for Kud, who was at the edge of the sidewalk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly reached for Kud, who was at the edge of the sidewalk.

MESSAGE.JP: ろうじて指がマントに引っかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I grasped for her cape, my fingers slipping on the fabric.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grasped for her cape, my fingers slipping on the fabric.

MESSAGE.JP: っかかったマントの先をそのままぐい、と引っ張って自分のそばに引き寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught her right at the end of her mantle, and pulled her back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught her right at the end of her mantle, and pulled her back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: おん、と風切る音がして車が目の前を通り過ぎていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Immediately after, the wind was cut off by a car passing right in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Immediately after, the wind was cut off by a car passing right in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「危なかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That was so close...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That was so close...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、ほっと息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a sigh of relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a sigh of relief.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「す、すみません…ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, I'm sorry... And thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, I'm sorry... And thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「パンフは帰ってから読もうよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'd better read your catalog when you're back in your room, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'd better read your catalog when you're back in your room, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そ、そうですね、はい、そうします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Y, you're right. I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Y, you're right. I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の腕の中に収まったクドのからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud answered, still wrapped in my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud answered, still wrapped in my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（本当に小さいな…このまま抱きしめたら折れちゃいそうだ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(So small... It's like she'd break if I embraced her a little more tightly...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(So small... It's like she'd break if I embraced her a little more tightly...)

MESSAGE.JP: ント越しでも、余計に小さく感じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even wearing her cloak, she still feels far too small.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even wearing her cloak, she still feels far too small.

MESSAGE.JP: の前には帽子から流れ出る亜麻色髪。
MESSAGE.EN: The flaxen hair flowing from under her hat filled my vision.
MESSAGE.Translation: The flaxen hair flowing from under her hat filled my vision.

MESSAGE.JP: るやかに波打った髪の毛に僕はつい見とれて…
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't stop staring at how it was gently swaying in the wind...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't stop staring at how it was gently swaying in the wind...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（って。何してるんだ、僕は！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Wait. What the heck am I doing!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Wait. What the heck am I doing!?)

MESSAGE.JP: はクドを抱え込んでいるような格好になっていることにようやく思い至って、慌てて手を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally realized I was embracing Kud, and separated from her in a hurry.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally realized I was embracing Kud, and separated from her in a hurry.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはわかっていなさそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't seem to understand why I was so flustered.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't seem to understand why I was so flustered.

MESSAGE.JP: ょとん、として僕を見上げている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was just looking up at me questioningly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was just looking up at me questioningly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、青になったよ、青」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look, the light's green now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look, the light's green now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は慌てて歩行者信号を示してから歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I pointed at the traffic light and began walking briskly ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pointed at the traffic light and began walking briskly ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そういえばリキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Speaking of which, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Speaking of which, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「青信号って緑色ですよねぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In Japan, people say the light is blue when they are talking about the green signal, don't they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In Japan, people say the light is blue when they are talking about the green signal, don't they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも赤信号は赤ですよねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But they say it's red when describing the red signal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But they say it's red when describing the red signal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なんか面白いですねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's kind of interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's kind of interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、あ、あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, yeah. A, ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, yeah. A, ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕の心の動揺なんか全然気がついてないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she hasn't realized at all how disturbed I am right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she hasn't realized at all how disturbed I am right now.

MESSAGE.JP: っと胸をなで下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: That made me a little relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: That made me a little relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: きどきが収まらない。
MESSAGE.EN: But my heart was still pounding.
MESSAGE.Translation: But my heart was still pounding.

MESSAGE.JP: し離れたクドとの距離が寂しくて、僕は手を伸ばしかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Feeling somehow lonely because of the short distance between us, I started to extend my arm toward her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Feeling somehow lonely because of the short distance between us, I started to extend my arm toward her.

MESSAGE.JP: も、止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I stopped myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I stopped myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 分が何をしたかったのかわからなくなったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't understand what it was I wanted to do, myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't understand what it was I wanted to do, myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 恥ずかしくなり、僕の手は、しばらくさまよったあと、ズボンのポケットの中に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: Feeling embarrassed, I ended up putting my hand back in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Feeling embarrassed, I ended up putting my hand back in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼過ぎ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's the afternoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's the afternoon.

MESSAGE.JP: 日はホットケーキパーティの日だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Today is the Little Busters pancake party.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today is the Little Busters pancake party.

MESSAGE.JP: と真人も、昼食の後から自室で待つことにしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I have been waiting for the start of the party in our room since after lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I have been waiting for the start of the party in our room since after lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そろそろかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's about time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's about time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 計を見ると、二時半を回ったところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the clock, which was showing half past two.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the clock, which was showing half past two.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まだ早くねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't it still a bit early?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't it still a bit early?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ちょっと早めに行って小毬さん手伝おうかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, but I want to go a little ahead of schedule to see if I can help Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, but I want to go a little ahead of schedule to see if I can help Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「パーティってことは準備とかもあるだろうしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There must be a lot of preparations to do for the party.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There must be a lot of preparations to do for the party.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「仕方ねぇな、オレも行くぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, I'll come with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, I'll come with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 連れ立って、学食に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We left for the cafeteria together.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We left for the cafeteria together.

MESSAGE.JP: 食のテーブルでは、ボウルやなんかの調理器具が広げられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon our arrival, we found various cooking equipment spread out on the tables.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon our arrival, we found various cooking equipment spread out on the tables.

MESSAGE.JP: すがにキッチンは使わせてもらえなかったのか、カセットコンロがいくつか用意されている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were also a few portable gas stoves among them. I guess we hadn't gotten permission to use the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were also a few portable gas stoves among them. I guess we hadn't gotten permission to use the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: の前で小毬さんとクドのふたりが、準備を進めているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In front of them, Komari-san and Kud were in the midst of preparations.
MESSAGE.Translation: In front of them, Komari-san and Kud were in the midst of preparations.

MESSAGE.JP: してその傍らには、パーティ用のシャンパングラスやクラッカーなんかが大量に用意されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the next table there were large quantities of crackers and champagne glasses.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the next table there were large quantities of crackers and champagne glasses.

MESSAGE.JP: これ、多分恭介だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Those must've been brought by Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Those must've been brought by Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: とまずそれは置いておく事にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's set that aside for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's set that aside for now.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「クーちゃん、そっちのボウルで粉とたまごまぜてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, will you put flour and eggs in that bowl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, will you put flour and eggs in that bowl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あせらないでいいから、ゆっくりね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No need to rush, take it easy～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No need to rush, take it easy～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「もうすぐだからがんばろー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The party starts soon, so let's work hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The party starts soon, so let's work hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、はいっ、急ぎますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, I'll get a hurry on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, I'll get a hurry on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さどさっ、と音を立てて、粉をボウルに入れていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She started pouring flour into a bowl.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started pouring flour into a bowl.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ha, ha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ha, ha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「くちゅんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Achoo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Achoo.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Can you please bring plates here for everyone～?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Yeah, I'm good at making sweet things.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But anybody can do this much once they get used to it. Easy, easy～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud's face was almost covered with the base she's making, and she looked like she was about to cry.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, I can't even do an easy thing～...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We, well, look, it's okay.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is it okay?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, it is a-okay.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, it's a-okay!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, doing good.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hew! It's the victory banquet!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Did we get here a little early?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke, Kengo and Rin, peeking from behind them, entered.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh hey, why don't we decorate the cafeteria?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 全に浮かれポンチと化していた。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How old are you? You shouldn't frolic around like that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hm, something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I will help.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Wow, thank you～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I just have to make it duper duper messy.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you set up these decorative ribbons.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's overdoing it a little...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think we need that many plates...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Pardon the delay.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wahh, what are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wahh, what are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと引かれていた。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, let's get cooking.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes!❞

MESSAGE.EN: We had three portable gas stoves; one courtesy of myself and the others brought by Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had three portable gas stoves; one courtesy of myself and the others brought by Komari-san.

MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san, Rin and Kud started making the pancakes.

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, cook them, cook faster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, cook them, cook faster.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I don't think you should behave like that, after not having helped at all.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh, but I'm a guest. Besides, you and Anego haven't either.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yes, we did. We went and bought the ingredients.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh... seriously?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Seriously.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehhh, then I'm the only one who hasn't done anything!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehhh, then I'm the only one who hasn't done anything!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I suggest you to work hard and take care of the clean-up afterward.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I second that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwahh, words like ❛clean-up❜ and ❛afterward❜ are on my most hated list!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwahh, words like ❛clean-up❜ and ❛afterward❜ are on my most hated list!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、しょうがないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, she had it coming.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, she had it coming.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, is it still much longer?❞

MESSAGE.EN: He was drumming on his plate with his knife and fork.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was drumming on his plate with his knife and fork.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「すげぇ腹減ってんだよ、くそぅ…もう生焼けのトロトロなのでいいからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm so starved. Damn... I don't care if it's half-baked, just give me some already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm so starved. Damn... I don't care if it's half-baked, just give me some already.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, they'll get it done soon enough.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝E, even if you're in a hurry, you can't rush the baking～...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I can't take it any more! I'll eat them raw...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I can't take it any more! I'll eat them raw...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きいっ！

MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、待ってあげろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, just wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, just wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwahh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwahh...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ...Masato had Rin's footprint on his face.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...My apologies.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, please do it, Kyousuke-san～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, not me. You're the host today.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So naturally, that's your part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So naturally, that's your part.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuee!? M-me!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Komarin, go for it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「う、うーん…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san, do your best.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well... well...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I... hereby pronounce our first pancake party... opened!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「みんなでいっぱい食べちゃってくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Everybody please eat a lot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Everybody please eat a lot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ー、という歓声と拍手の音。
MESSAGE.EN: We all cheered and clapped our hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: We all cheered and clapped our hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「はぁ…こういうのは緊張するよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Haa... I get nervous when it comes to doing this sort of stuff～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haa... I get nervous when it comes to doing this sort of stuff～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、よく出来たんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It went really well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It went really well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ、そうかなぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こまりちゃん、がんばった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari-chan, great work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari-chan, great work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、ありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, thank you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, thank you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「始めるかっ!!　俺たちの勝利の宴を!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's begin the victory banquet!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's begin the victory banquet!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いぃよっしゃぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Here we go!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Here we go!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やばい…ばかしかいない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Gosh... He's totally flipped out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Gosh... He's totally flipped out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やばい…ばかが増えている…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Gosh... They're acting like retards...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Gosh... They're acting like retards...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kyousuke-san, can you please make a toast?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや？　今日は小毬の主催だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No. You're the host today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No. You're the host today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「当然、音頭も小毬が取るべきだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So naturally, you're supposed to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So naturally, you're supposed to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふええっ!?　わ、私っ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fueee!? Me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fueee!? Me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さあ、みんなもグラスを取れっ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Everybody, grab your glasses.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: He made each one of us hold a champagne glass.

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, is this... alcohol?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, is this... alcohol?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、炭酸リンゴジュースみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, looks like carbonated apple juice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, looks like carbonated apple juice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さあ、行き渡ったな!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, everybody's got a glass!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, everybody's got a glass!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「小毬、頼むぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Go for it, Komari!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Go for it, Komari!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんにマイクを手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: He handed a microphone to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He handed a microphone to her.

MESSAGE.JP: の恭介を止められる人間は誰もいなさそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think anyone could stop him now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think anyone could stop him now...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えーと、てす…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ほわぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: のすごいエコーが掛かっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice echoed really loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice echoed really loud.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「う、うえぇーん、きょうすけさはぁーんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, uehhhhn, Kyousuke-saaan!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, uehhhhn, Kyousuke-saaan!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「勝利した今のおまえならやれるさ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're a winner today, you can do it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're a winner today, you can do it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そっかー!!　ようしっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's right!! All right!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's right!! All right!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すがに単純だ！
MESSAGE.EN: What a simple girl!
MESSAGE.Translation: What a simple girl!

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんは頷くと、マイクを構えなおす。
MESSAGE.EN: She clutched the microphone tightly again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clutched the microphone tightly again.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「レディース・アーンド・ジェントーメーン!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ladies and gentlemen!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ladies and gentlemen!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「大変長らくお待たせいたしましたっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Thank you for waiting!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Thank you for waiting!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんも割とノリノリだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be in high spirits.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be in high spirits.

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、なんだか手馴れているように見える。
MESSAGE.EN: More like, it was somehow like she was already completely used to this.
MESSAGE.Translation: More like, it was somehow like she was already completely used to this.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「これよりっ、第一回みんなでホットケーキパーティ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We are about to commence our first pancake party...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We are about to commence our first pancake party...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あーんどリトルバスターズ祝勝会を開催いたしますっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And a joint celebration for the victory of the Little Busters!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And a joint celebration for the victory of the Little Busters!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「みんないっぱい食べて飲んで歌っちゃってくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Everybody eat, drink and sing a lot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Everybody eat, drink and sing a lot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ヒィイーーーーヤァーーーッホォォォオオオゥゥゥゥーーーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Heeyahhohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Heeyahhohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「イヨェェエェエエーーー
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yoehhhhhhhhhh――
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yoehhhhhhhhhh――

MESSAGE.JP: ホッゲホッ」
MESSAGE.EN: *Cough*cough*!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: *Cough*cough*!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ァァァァァァアーーーー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Uhhhhhhh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Uhhhhhhh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: き込んで喉が枯れてしまっても、なお叫び続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though his throat got hoarse from coughing, he kept shouting out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though his throat got hoarse from coughing, he kept shouting out.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「わっしょい！　わっしょい!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wasshoi! Wasshoi!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wasshoi! Wasshoi!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおっ、すげえ…往年のロック・フェスティバルを見ているようだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoh, cool... This looks just like that old rock festival...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoh, cool... This looks just like that old rock festival...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおっ、すげえ…往年のロック・シンガーを見ているようだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoh, cool... It's like I'm looking at that former rock singer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoh, cool... It's like I'm looking at that former rock singer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こまりちゃんはがんばったが、きょーすけはアホだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari-chan did great, but Kyousuke is just a fool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari-chan did great, but Kyousuke is just a fool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「はっ、アホで結構!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hah, yes, I am the king of fools!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hah, yes, I am the king of fools!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、とマイクを構える。
MESSAGE.EN: He held up the microphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: He held up the microphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「乾杯だ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's have a toast!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's have a toast!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺たちの勝利を祝して!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝To our victory!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝To our victory!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の言葉とともに、グラスの鳴る甲高い音が響き渡った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The sound of our glasses echoed together with his yell as we toasted.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The sound of our glasses echoed together with his yell as we toasted.

MESSAGE.JP: さらに待つこと数分。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Another few minutes passed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Another few minutes passed.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これはそろそろ出来たのではないでしょうか？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think I'm just about done with my pancake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ、クーちゃんのはちょっと薄めだったから、もういいかもー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, yours is thin, so it might be good already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, yours is thin, so it might be good already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yep!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yep!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san raised the lid from Kud's frying pan and checked her pancake's condition by poking it with a chopstick.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、だいじょうぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've got it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've got it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーブルに突っ伏していた真人の方へ駆けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She ran up to Masato, who was lying face down on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ran up to Masato, who was lying face down on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「井ノ原さんっ、焼けましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Inohara-san, it's ready.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Inohara-san, it's ready.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いよっしゃぁーっ！　ひゃっほぅーーーーぅ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right!! Hyahooohhhhhh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right!! Hyahooohhhhhh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 座に皿を構え、フライパンの元へ。
MESSAGE.EN: He immediately seized a plate and dashed toward the frying pans.
MESSAGE.Translation: He immediately seized a plate and dashed toward the frying pans.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…さもしいやつだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...He's such a pig.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...He's such a pig.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「は？　ほへーはほふっふへんほはむはふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Hoheha hofufu hen hofuhofu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Hoheha hofufu hen hofuhofu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でに食べ始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He'd already begun eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: He'd already begun eating.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なにを言ってるかさっぱりわからん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I have no idea what he's saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I have no idea what he's saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあまあ。いいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well now, isn't it fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well now, isn't it fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なあに、今日ばかりは無礼講さっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You can throw away the formalities today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You can throw away the formalities today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「イエーイッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yaaay!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yaaay!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あんっ、とクラッカーを鳴らす。
MESSAGE.EN: He started popping crackers.
MESSAGE.Translation: He started popping crackers.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「仕方ないな。俺は神北のが焼けるのを待つとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's no other way. I'll wait for Kamikita to finish baking hers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's no other way. I'll wait for Kamikita to finish baking hers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふーん、なんだかんだでおまえも腹すかせてるのな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm, so you're starving as well, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm, so you're starving as well, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…うるさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Shaddap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Shaddap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を向ける謙吾に、僕と恭介は忍び笑いをする。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and I chuckled as he turned his back on us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and I chuckled as he turned his back on us.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾も結構楽しみにしてたって事なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I figure he, too, had been looking forward to this party.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I figure he, too, had been looking forward to this party.

MESSAGE.JP: にした飲み物を一気に飲み干し、ようやく真人が一息つく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato gulped down his juice in one go and heaved a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato gulped down his juice in one go and heaved a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「かーーーっ、うめぇーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kuhhhh, delicious!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kuhhhh, delicious!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですか、じゃんじゃん焼くのでばりばり食べてくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? I'm gonna make a lot, so fill yourself up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? I'm gonna make a lot, so fill yourself up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おかわりっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seconds!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seconds!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「早いですっ!?　ばりばり食べすぎですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So fast! You're filling yourself up too fast!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So fast! You're filling yourself up too fast!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ていうか何ひとりで全部食べてるんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wait a minute, what are you doing eating it all by yourself!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wait a minute, what are you doing eating it all by yourself!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ？　ああ、わりい、ひとり一枚ずつかと思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uh? Ah, my bad. I thought everyone gets their own pancake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uh? Ah, my bad. I thought everyone gets their own pancake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「もっと人のことまでちゃんと考えなきゃダメですヨ。分け合い助け合いですヨ。ラヴアンドピースですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You have to take everyone else into consideration! You know, the value of sharing, love and peace!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You have to take everyone else into consideration! You know, the value of sharing, love and peace!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ちなみにこれをクドクドお説教をするといいます。クドは今後使うよーに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝By the way, see how I'm giving a long-winded lecture. Kud, this is how you should do it in the future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝By the way, see how I'm giving a long-winded lecture. Kud, this is how you should do it in the future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ、わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, I understand!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, I understand!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 落だったんだろうが、クドは全く理解していないようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have been a jest, although Kud didn't seem to realize it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must have been a jest, although Kud didn't seem to realize it.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「こっちも焼けたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm done baking～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm done baking～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「それ全部貰ったーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's all mine!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's all mine!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーっ、と即座に駆け出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She dashed for it right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She dashed for it right away.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「行動がさっきのセリフと全然違いますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Has she forgotten what she said just a few seconds ago!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Has she forgotten what she said just a few seconds ago!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、それはいつものことだし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, that's just how she is.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, that's just how she is.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おいこら待てぇっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Not so fast!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Not so fast!❞

MESSAGE.JP: こへ謙吾の一喝。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo roared out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo roared out.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そいつは俺も楽しみにしていたんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That one was waiting to be eaten by me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That one was waiting to be eaten by me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「はぁ。じゃ、どうすれば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haa. Then, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haa. Then, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅばっ、
MESSAGE.EN: *Slash*,
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slash*,

MESSAGE.JP: ゃきーんっ！
