MESSAGE.JP: 、自分がいつもいる場所を外から眺めてみて、改めて思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking in from outside the place where I usually am, I'm again reminded of that fact.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking in from outside the place where I usually am, I'm again reminded of that fact.

MESSAGE.JP: からもそうだったけれど、この春からは特に騒がしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though he has always been noisy, he's been especially lively this spring.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though he has always been noisy, he's been especially lively this spring.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: に振り向く。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to face the voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to face the voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「理樹君、外出てたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You were here, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You were here, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ちょっと夕涼みにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm cooling myself for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm cooling myself for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃあ、私もちょっと夕涼み～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll do that too～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll do that too～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、僕の隣に腰掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she sat down next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she sat down next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さん、もうホットケーキはいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san, you don't have to make pancakes anymore?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san, you don't have to make pancakes anymore?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「今はクーちゃんが全部焼いてるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No. Kuu-chan is making them now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No. Kuu-chan is making them now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「一生懸命だよ。真人君と謙吾君がどんどん食べちゃうからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's really hard, because Masato-kun and Kengo-kun are gobbling them up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's really hard, because Masato-kun and Kengo-kun are gobbling them up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なので私はちょっとお休みなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So I'm taking a little break now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So I'm taking a little break now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は謙吾との口論の声が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We could hear those two guys arguing inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We could hear those two guys arguing inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ああ…またケンカしてるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh... They're doing it again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh... They're doing it again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、いつものことだしなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh huh, same as always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh huh, same as always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介も来ヶ谷さんもいるし、別に大丈夫だと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke and Kurugaya-san are with them, so I guess it's gonna be okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke and Kurugaya-san are with them, so I guess it's gonna be okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なんか最初はびっくりしてばっかりだったけど、最近は慣れてきちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝At first I always got surprised, but I'm getting used to it now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝At first I always got surprised, but I'm getting used to it now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、もうだいぶ長いこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right. It's been that long, already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right. It's been that long, already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「春からって、まだ一ヶ月も経ってないじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It hasn't even been a month since the spring term started, yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It hasn't even been a month since the spring term started, yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？　そうだねえ、そういえば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Come to think of it, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Come to think of it, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう、なんか…ずいぶん長いことみんなといるような気がしてたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Somehow I felt like we've all been together for a long time, already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Somehow I felt like we've all been together for a long time, already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…うん、私もかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Yep, me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Yep, me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「理樹君は、楽しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, are you happy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, are you happy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…今までで一番楽しいのかもしれない、今が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I think I've been having the happiest time in my life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I think I've been having the happiest time in my life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の喧騒の中で、思うこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Amidst all that hustle and bustle...
MESSAGE.Translation: Amidst all that hustle and bustle...

MESSAGE.JP: れはやっぱり、その一言。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the one thought that came to my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the one thought that came to my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、そっか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…私もそうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I think I have, as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I think I have, as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな思いを共有しあう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We shared that common thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We shared that common thought.

MESSAGE.JP: のリトルバスターズってチームは、そういう場所だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The Little Busters is simply the kind of team that makes you happy just being part of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Little Busters is simply the kind of team that makes you happy just being part of it.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そろそろもどろっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I guess that's about enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I guess that's about enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: じっと見られる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふんふんふ～ん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hun hun hun～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hun hun hun～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんは、鼻歌交じりに小走りで戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She went back inside, humming to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went back inside, humming to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: んとなく、僕まで笑顔になった。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, I couldn't help but smile too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, I couldn't help but smile too.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もう食えねぇ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can't eat anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can't eat anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺の勝ちだな…うはは…はは…うぇっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's my victory... Hahaha... haha... ueh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's my victory... Hahaha... haha... ueh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりがダウンしたところで、お開きとなる。
MESSAGE.EN: The end of the food war between the two guys also marked the end of the party.
MESSAGE.Translation: The end of the food war between the two guys also marked the end of the party.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がダウンしたところで、お開きとなる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...When Masato finally gave up eating, the party was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...When Masato finally gave up eating, the party was over.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だらしねえな！　俺はまだまだいけるぜ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is that all you've got!? I can still keep going!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is that all you've got!? I can still keep going!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は最後までひとりテンションＭＡＸだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke had been hyper until the very end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke had been hyper until the very end.

MESSAGE.JP: 員で後片付けをしながら、ちょっと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: While putting things in order, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: While putting things in order, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…またこういうの、やりたいな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...I want to do this sort of thing again.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...I want to do this sort of thing again.)

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんが僕をじっと見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san was watching me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san was watching me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にかんだように笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me a bashful smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me a bashful smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もそれに、笑い返した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I smiled back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I smiled back.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹、いるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, you there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, you there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屋にひとりでいると、ドアの向こうから謙吾の声が。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was by myself in our room, I heard Kengo's voice from the other side of the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was by myself in our room, I heard Kengo's voice from the other side of the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、入っていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yep, come in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yep, come in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちゃり、とドアが開き、謙吾が顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: The door opened and Kengo looked in.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door opened and Kengo looked in.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…恭介もいなかったが、バカもいないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...That fool's away, too? Kyousuke was, as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...That fool's away, too? Kyousuke was, as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: や、今の謙吾も十分バカだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd say you're fooling around plenty enough yourself...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd say you're fooling around plenty enough yourself...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふたりでなんか買いものに行ったみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The two of them went shopping.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The two of them went shopping.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうか。少しタイミングがずれてしまったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Really? I have bad timing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Really? I have bad timing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん、謙吾もなんか買い物？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, are you going out to buy something, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, are you going out to buy something, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ、まあ急ぎでもないし構わんのだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yes. But it's not that I need it right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yes. But it's not that I need it right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んじゃ暇だし僕も行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I have nothing to do at the moment, so I'll go with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I have nothing to do at the moment, so I'll go with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「すまんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 単に準備を済ませ、謙吾とふたりで寮を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I got myself ready quickly and left the dorm with him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got myself ready quickly and left the dorm with him.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の買い物はなにかのスポーツ用具らしく、商店街の専門店までの遠出となった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because Kengo was planning on checking sporting goods, we went to the specialized store on the shopping street.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because Kengo was planning on checking sporting goods, we went to the specialized store on the shopping street.

MESSAGE.JP: から出た頃には、すでに空はオレンジがかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When we left the store, we found the sky already tinted orange.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we left the store, we found the sky already tinted orange.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「だいぶ遅くなってしまったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It took a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It took a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んー、別にいいよ。ひとりで部屋にいてもやることないしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's okay. I had nothing to do by myself in the room anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's okay. I had nothing to do by myself in the room anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾とふたりで河原の道を歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We were walking along the riverside road.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were walking along the riverside road.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…怪我、もう大丈夫なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you okay with your injury?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you okay with your injury?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「普通に生活する程度なら支障はない。まだ本調子とは行かないがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah, it doesn't affect my everyday life. I need more time to recover fully, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah, it doesn't affect my everyday life. I need more time to recover fully, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふうん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の大立ち回りでその程度で済むって、謙吾の身体能力も底が知れない…。
MESSAGE.EN: His hardiness is beyond measure. If I fell down from the roof like him, I wouldn't even be alive...
MESSAGE.Translation: His hardiness is beyond measure. If I fell down from the roof like him, I wouldn't even be alive...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「おーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Heey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Heey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to face the direction the voice had come from.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to face the direction the voice had come from.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なにやってんだお前ら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the heck are you guys doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the heck are you guys doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「奇遇だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nice coincidence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nice coincidence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりが土手を駆け上がってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The duo ran up to us from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: The duo ran up to us from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、二人も今帰りなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you guys on your way back as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you guys on your way back as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ、たいした用事じゃねえしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえらも外に出る用事があるなら先に言えよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You guys should have told us you were going out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You guys should have told us you were going out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「特に謙吾、お前携帯くらい使えって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Especially Kengo. What d'you have your cellphone for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Especially Kengo. What d'you have your cellphone for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…電話は苦手だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...I don't like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...I don't like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに謙吾は携帯を持ってはいるものの、あんまり使うことがないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo does own a cellphone, although he usually doesn't use it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo does own a cellphone, although he usually doesn't use it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえば鈴は一緒じゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought Rin was with you guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought Rin was with you guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あいつなら来ヶ谷に連れて行かれてたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kurugaya took her away somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kurugaya took her away somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…来ヶ谷さんにか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「小毬も一緒だったし、大丈夫だろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Komari went with them as well, so it was fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Komari went with them as well, so it was fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふうん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が友達と出かけるなんて、昔からはちょっと想像もできない。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin has really changed. She's never gone out with anybody but us childhood friends before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin has really changed. She's never gone out with anybody but us childhood friends before.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…まあ、そういうわけだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Well, that's how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Well, that's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んだ、兄貴にべったりじゃなくて寂しいかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, are you feeling lonely because she's growing apart from you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, are you feeling lonely because she's growing apart from you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そんなことねえよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Not at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Not at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それがいいことなんだと、恭介も思っているみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kyousuke also seemed to agree that it was a good thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke also seemed to agree that it was a good thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「あれー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「やっぱり皆さんなのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝My guess was right. It's them!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝My guess was right. It's them!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 面から駆けてくるふたり。
MESSAGE.EN: Two girls were running toward us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two girls were running toward us.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「はろ～ガイズっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haro～, gaizu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haro～, gaizu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はろ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haro～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haro～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、ふたりも外出？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Were you two out, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Were you two out, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「それが三人なんだなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Not two. Three.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Not two. Three.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんが後ろを親指でさす。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed her thumb behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed her thumb behind her.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大きな日傘を揺らせて、西園さんが歩いてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...With her big parasol, Nishizono-san was walking over toward us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...With her big parasol, Nishizono-san was walking over toward us.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「みんなで本屋さんに行ってたのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We went to a bookstore together～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We went to a bookstore together～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんかどんどん大所帯になってくな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝More and more people are getting here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝More and more people are getting here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「まーまー旅は道連れ世は情けですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it's nice to have fellow travelers on your journey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it's nice to have fellow travelers on your journey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…なんか、このままだと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...If this keeps on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...If this keeps on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…あれをみてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Look at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Look at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の呟きを遮って、西園さんが河のほうを指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: Interrupting Kyousuke's words, she pointed in the direction of the river.
MESSAGE.Translation: Interrupting Kyousuke's words, she pointed in the direction of the river.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れば、小石がふたつ、水面を跳ねながら対岸へと向かっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were two stones skipping on the surface of the water.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were two stones skipping on the surface of the water.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「ふたりともすごい～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝You two sure are amazing～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝You two sure are amazing～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Umu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Umu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありゃ、小毬さんと来ヶ谷さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Komari-san and Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Komari-san and Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゅっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoosh*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoosh*.

MESSAGE.JP: ちゃぱちゃんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Zup*zup*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Zup*zup*!!

MESSAGE.JP: もそれに混じって水切りをやっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Along with the other two girls, Rin was also skipping stones.
MESSAGE.Translation: Along with the other two girls, Rin was also skipping stones.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…やっぱりな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I knew it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I knew it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか、全員揃っちゃったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The Little Busters are all gathered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The Little Busters are all gathered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、水切りをやっていた三人も合流。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The three girls who had been skipping stones also joined our company.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The three girls who had been skipping stones also joined our company.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「すごい偶然だね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's an amazing coincidence～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's an amazing coincidence～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「まー、外に出たらこの道通らないともったいないですよネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, you do need to walk this road when you go out from the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, you do need to walk this road when you go out from the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私もこの土手の道は大好きですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love this road, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love this road, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介が顎に手をやり、息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: He rested his chin on his hand and exhaled in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: He rested his chin on his hand and exhaled in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…また何か始めるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You want to do something again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You want to do something again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、みんな聞けっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, everybody listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, everybody listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の一声に、みんな振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: All of us turned around to face him.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of us turned around to face him.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「せっかくだから記念撮影でもしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't we take a photo as a memento?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't we take a photo as a memento?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「記念？　何の記念だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝As a memento? A memento of what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝As a memento? A memento of what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そりゃあ、あれだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「リトルバスターズ結成十年を祝してだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's been ten years since the founding of the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's been ten years since the founding of the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…十年も経ってたっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you sure it's already been ten years?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you sure it's already been ten years?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そもそもわたし達はまだ入ったばかりなのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In the first place, a few members, myself included, only just joined the team...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In the first place, a few members, myself included, only just joined the team...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、何の記念でもいいさ。撮る事が大切なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, don't sweat the details. What's important is taking the picture itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, don't sweat the details. What's important is taking the picture itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「決まってるだろ！　俺たちの勝利記念だよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, a memento of our victory!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, a memento of our victory!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「何枚目だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How many do you want...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How many do you want...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 試合の後にも散々撮ったばっかりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: We had already taken a ton of pictures right after the game.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had already taken a ton of pictures right after the game.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「何枚でもいいだろ。撮る事が大切なんだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It doesn't matter how many. What's important is the taking of them itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It doesn't matter how many. What's important is the taking of them itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はそういうと、懐からデジカメを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: He answered and produced a digital camera out of a pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: He answered and produced a digital camera out of a pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: つもながら、ほんとに色んなものを持ち歩いてるよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: He's always carrying so many things on him...
MESSAGE.Translation: He's always carrying so many things on him...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…あたしはいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'll pass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'll pass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば、鈴は写真を撮られるのが苦手だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking of which, she doesn't like to be photographed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking of which, she doesn't like to be photographed.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ダメ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, you can't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, you can't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: げようとする鈴の制服の首を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: He got hold of her collar.
MESSAGE.Translation: He got hold of her collar.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「はなせ、ぼけーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let me go, idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let me go, idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「りんちゃん、一緒に撮ろうよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, I want you to be here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, I want you to be here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです。きっといい写真が撮れるのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Me too. I'm sure it's going to be a nice picture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Me too. I'm sure it's going to be a nice picture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりに言われると断り辛いらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she can't turn down a request from those two.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she can't turn down a request from those two.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあいいじゃないか。魂が抜かれるわけでもなし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You don't have to be so nervous. It's not like you'll lose your soul.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You don't have to be so nervous. It's not like you'll lose your soul.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…残るものというのは、きっといつか残しておいてよかったと思うさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...This is going to be a good memory.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...This is going to be a good memory.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「はいはーいそれじゃー早速撮りますかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's get ready for shots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's get ready for shots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんが強引に鈴を引き戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pulled Rin back forcibly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pulled Rin back forcibly.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「待て、誰が撮るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wait, who will do the shooting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wait, who will do the shooting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あー、やっぱ全員入ってないとしっくりこないよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's true, all of us must be included.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's true, all of us must be included.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は辺りを見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked around.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked around.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お、うちの生徒か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look, there's somebody over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look, there's somebody over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あいつに頼もう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll go ask her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll go ask her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手にいたひとりの女子生徒に声を掛けに行く。
MESSAGE.EN: He ran over to the girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: He ran over to the girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…わたくしに何か御用ですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Can I do something to help you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Can I do something to help you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「さーちゃんこんにちはー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hi, Sah-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hi, Sah-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あら、神北さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh, Kamikita-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh, Kamikita-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ごきげんよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well met.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well met.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こりと頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ごきげんよう～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well met～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well met～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんも同じように挨拶。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san bowed back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san bowed back.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…そういえば、神北さんもでしたわね。この集団に付き合っているのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Come to think of it, you are one of this group too, Kamikita-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Come to think of it, you are one of this group too, Kamikita-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、友達だから～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, they are friends of mine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, they are friends of mine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんだ、知り合いなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You guys know each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You guys know each other?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ええ、前のクラスで少し」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Yes, we belonged to the same class before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Yes, we belonged to the same class before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…よかったですわね、お世話をしてくださる方が見つかって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I am happy for you. You have found people who will take care of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I am happy for you. You have found people who will take care of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？　違うよ。私がお世話する方だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? No. I'm the one who takes care of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? No. I'm the one who takes care of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…される方ですわよ、あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...No, you are one to be taken care of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...No, you are one to be taken care of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんと笹瀬川さんが話をしているところを、鈴が小毬さんを自分の後ろに引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rin drew and hid Komari-san behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rin drew and hid Komari-san behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「わあ、な、なにりんちゃん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Wah, what's up, Rin-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Wah, what's up, Rin-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あら…棗さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh... Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh... Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、おまえにもう用はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, you're not needed anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, you're not needed anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「呼びつけておいてずいぶんですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How dare you say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How dare you say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあまあまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Easy, easy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Easy, easy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に恭介が割って入る。
MESSAGE.EN: He broke between them.
MESSAGE.Translation: He broke between them.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「今日は取り巻きはどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Where are your minions?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Where are your minions?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしもひとり、思いに耽る事もありますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Even I fancy some time alone every once in a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Even I fancy some time alone every once in a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介を無視して続けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They ignored him and kept quarreling.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They ignored him and kept quarreling.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…まいったな、これは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Gosh, they aren't listening to me at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Gosh, they aren't listening to me at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「妬いているようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She seems to carry jealousy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She seems to carry jealousy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「え、えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: と笹瀬川さんは睨み合ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and Sasasegawa-san were still staring at each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and Sasasegawa-san were still staring at each other.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なんだか険悪なムードです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They sure are in a bad mood...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They sure are in a bad mood...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「よくわかんないけど、これは小毬ちゃんを奪い合ってのバトルなんですかネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm not really sure, but are you guys battling for Komari-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm not really sure, but are you guys battling for Komari-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それでいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's a good reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's a good reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやよくないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ささかまさしみ…おまえにこまりちゃんは渡さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sashimi Sasakama... I'm not letting you have Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sashimi Sasakama... I'm not letting you have Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「マヨネーズが合いそうな名前だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I guess mayonnaise would go well with that name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I guess mayonnaise would go well with that name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「さ・さ・せ・が・わ・さ・さ・みですわっ!!　どれだけライバルやってるんですのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝My name is Sa-sa-mi Sa-sa-se-ga-wa!! How long have you been my rival!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝My name is Sa-sa-mi Sa-sa-se-ga-wa!! How long have you been my rival!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、なんかよくわからんが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'm not so sure what they are talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'm not so sure what they are talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は後ろで笹瀬川さんの視界から外れるようにしていた謙吾に振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned to face Kengo, who was trying to get out of Sasasegawa-san's sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned to face Kengo, who was trying to get out of Sasasegawa-san's sight.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おい、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…俺に構うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Don't touch me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Don't touch me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんが苦手なんだろうなぁ、やっぱり。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like he's not that good with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like he's not that good with her.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ聞けって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, just hear me out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, just hear me out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: い顔をしている謙吾に、恭介が何か耳打ちを始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: He gave a whisper to Kengo, who had an unpleasant look on his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: He gave a whisper to Kengo, who had an unpleasant look on his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「理由なんてどうでもいいですわ。長年の決着、今ここでつけてもよろしくてよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I need no more reasons to fight you. We should settle our differences right here and now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I need no more reasons to fight you. We should settle our differences right here and now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「望むところだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Couldn't ask for more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Couldn't ask for more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変らずこっちのふたりはノリノリだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was going just like always between them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was going just like always between them.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ああう…ど、どうしよう～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Aau... What are we gonna do～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Aau... What are we gonna do～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「『まちたまえおじょうさんがた』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝❛Wait for a minute, ladies.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝❛Wait for a minute, ladies.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 棒読みで謙吾が言う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He said in a singsong.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He said in a singsong.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ま、まあ、宮沢さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝O, oh my, Miyazawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝O, oh my, Miyazawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、その調子だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good, that's it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good, that's it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の差し金のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The mastermind Kyousuke struck again.
MESSAGE.Translation: The mastermind Kyousuke struck again.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「『ここはぼくにめんじてしゃしんをとってもらえませんか、うつくしいひと』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝❛Would you please stop being so angry and take a photograph of us, oh beautiful lady?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝❛Would you please stop being so angry and take a photograph of us, oh beautiful lady?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あ、あら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh my...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh my...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「宮沢さんにそう言っていただけるなんて、恐縮ですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If Miyazawa-san so says, I would be much obliged to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If Miyazawa-san so says, I would be much obliged to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「写真の撮影、謹んでお受けいたします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I would be happy to take your picture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I would be happy to take your picture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: カートをつまんで恭しく頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She took hold of her skirt and curtsied.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took hold of her skirt and curtsied.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、いい感じだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 雑な表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: He had a complex expression on his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had a complex expression on his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「はーいはい、そういうわけで並んだ並んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now everybody, get lined up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now everybody, get lined up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「待て、決着が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait, I gotta fight her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait, I gotta fight her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「休戦ってことでいいだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Cease-fire, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Cease-fire, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…仕方ないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「今日のところは、勝負はお預けだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, let's postpone this fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, let's postpone this fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言って、くるりと踵を返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「体よく逃げる気か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝D'you really think you can get out with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝D'you really think you can get out with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんが捕まえていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san caught her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san caught her.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…宮沢様の頼みとはいえ、何故わたくしがこんなことを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I know this is Miyazawa-sama's request, but why do I have to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I know this is Miyazawa-sama's request, but why do I have to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介から渡されたデジカメを手に、笹瀬川さんがぼやいていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was complaining as Kyousuke passed her the camera.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was complaining as Kyousuke passed her the camera.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「使い方は解るよな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You know how to use it, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You know how to use it, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「シャッターを切ればいいんでしょう？　誰でもできますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You only have to press the shutter, no? Anyone can do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You only have to press the shutter, no? Anyone can do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「んで、これでズーム」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And this is the zoom-up button.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And this is the zoom-up button.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あ、あら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝O, oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝O, oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さん、機械苦手なタイプみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She doesn't seem good at using electrical appliances.
MESSAGE.Translation: She doesn't seem good at using electrical appliances.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「じゃあ、撮りますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Very well, I am ready.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Very well, I am ready.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「もっとみんな寄ろ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Everybody get closer to each other～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Everybody get closer to each other～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こまりちゃんくっつきすぎだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari-chan, you're too close!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari-chan, you're too close!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私も鈴さんにくっつきますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sticking to Rin-san, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sticking to Rin-san, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わ、葉留佳さんこっちきすぎっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san, leave space.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san, leave space.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「姉御が押してくるんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego is pushing me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego is pushing me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、まあこういうほうがらしくていいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha-ha-ha, I think this is how we are supposed to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha-ha-ha, I think this is how we are supposed to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…く、来ヶ谷さん、手が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Kurugaya-san, your hands are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Kurugaya-san, your hands are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレ真ん中なっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The center position is mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The center position is mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…これで大丈夫か!?　背中のロゴは入っているか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Is this okay!? Is the logo on the back in the finder!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Is this okay!? Is the logo on the back in the finder!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、いいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「よろしくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Are you people ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Are you people ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うわぁああぁーーっ、くっつきすぎだぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nooooo, you guys are too close to me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nooooo, you guys are too close to me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なかよし～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We are getting along so well～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We are getting along so well～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なかよしです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, we are～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, we are～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、来ヶ谷さん…寄ってきすぎだってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kurugaya-san... Step away a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kurugaya-san... Step away a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「西園女史ももっと詰めてくるがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ms. Nishizono too, get closer to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ms. Nishizono too, get closer to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「も、もっとですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝C, closer...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝C, closer...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…本当によろしいのかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Are you guys sure you are ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Are you guys sure you are ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、撮ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「行きますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Okay, here I go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Okay, here I go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 影が終わると、笹瀬川さんは一足先に寮へ戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: After the shooting, Sasasegawa-san went back to the dorm alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the shooting, Sasasegawa-san went back to the dorm alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「おぉー、よく撮れてますネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ohh, looks nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ohh, looks nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「写真欲しいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I want a real copy of that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I want a real copy of that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、んじゃ今度現像しとくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll print it out later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll print it out later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…データだけってのも味気ないしな。小毬が大事に持っててくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...It's dull keeping photos as digital data only.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...It's dull keeping photos as digital data only.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、もらったらすっごい大事にするよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah, I'm gonna take good care of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, I'm gonna take good care of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「どうぞ、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Take a look too, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Take a look too, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんからデジカメを手渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me the camera.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me the camera.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の小さな画面に写る、今撮った写真を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: The screen of the camera displayed the photo just taken.
MESSAGE.Translation: The screen of the camera displayed the photo just taken.

MESSAGE.JP: 心に僕と鈴、周りにみんな。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and I are in the center, and everyone else packed around us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and I are in the center, and everyone else packed around us.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅうぎゅうに詰めてくるみんなに、僕と鈴は困惑気味で…。
MESSAGE.EN: They all seem to be trying to stick to the two of us, and we have kinda confused looks...
MESSAGE.Translation: They all seem to be trying to stick to the two of us, and we have kinda confused looks...

MESSAGE.JP: のみんなは、楽しそうに笑っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The others are all smiling happily.
MESSAGE.Translation: The others are all smiling happily.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んだよ、ニヤニヤして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, what's with that grin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, what's with that grin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、楽しそうで…。
MESSAGE.EN: We really seemed to be having fun in the picture.
MESSAGE.Translation: We really seemed to be having fun in the picture.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、今の生活の、象徴のようで…。
MESSAGE.EN: And it represented well how wonderfully we are living right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: And it represented well how wonderfully we are living right now...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごく、よく撮れてると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's very nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's very nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、
MESSAGE.EN: As for me,
MESSAGE.Translation: As for me,

MESSAGE.JP: この生活がずっと続けばいい』。
MESSAGE.EN: (If only our lives could always continue just like this.)
MESSAGE.Translation: (If only our lives could always continue just like this.)

MESSAGE.JP: 写真を見ながら、そう思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looking at the photograph, that's what I wished for.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looking at the photograph, that's what I wished for.
